query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `reminder_queue` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `appointment_id` int NOT NULL,
  `patient_id` int NOT NULL,
  `reminder_type` enum('2_days_before_10h','2_days_before_15h','2_days_before_19h','1_day_before_7h','1_day_before_8h','1_day_before_10h','1_day_before_12h','1_day_before_14h','1_day_before_16h','1_day_before_18h','same_day_6h30','same_day_3h_before','post_confirmation_next_day','same_day_confirmed_7h') NOT NULL,
  `scheduled_at` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `sent_at` timestamp NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','sent','failed','cancelled') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `whatsapp_number` varchar(50),
  `message_id` varchar(255),
  `delivery_status` enum('sent','delivered','read','failed'),
  `error_message` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  KEY `idx_scheduled_at` (`scheduled_at`),
  KEY `idx_status` (`status`),
  KEY `idx_appointment` (`appointment_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`appointment_id`) REFERENCES `appointments`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`patient_id`) REFERENCES `patients`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
)

  `scheduled_at` timestamp NOT NULL,

  KEY `idx_scheduled_at` (`scheduled_at`),
  KEY `idx_status` (`status`),
  KEY `idx_appointment` (`appointment_id`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`appointment_id`) REFERENCES `appointments`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,

)
